name: Shrinking Room (Darezar of Eledris)
description:
Shrinking Room is a fast-paced 3D platformer created for the Chronicles GameDev Challenge, Week 3 gamejam.

In this game, the player has to escape the room by jumping up blocks, while the walls are closing in. If they reach the top before the walls crush them to death, they win!

Controls

WSAD - Walk

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint
